propositions.text: Female-dominated society where women hold power and men are subordinate
Women are expected to excel in academics and governance
Men are expected to manage household duties and support their wives
Protagonist loses family and faces hardship due to family disgrace
Protagonist aims to clear family name through academic and political success
Success in initial exams despite opposition and rumors
Overcoming challenges and proving talent in final exams
Protagonist struggles between love and duty to avenge family
External pressures from powerful figures to control protagonist through marriage
Pursuit of revenge and uncovering the truth
Protagonist discovers the true culprit behind family disgrace
Protagonist risks life to expose corruption and achieve justice
Protagonist finds peace by letting go of revenge and choosing a simple life

concepts.name: Female Dominance
concepts.context: Central societal structure where women hold power

concepts.name: Revenge
concepts.context: Protagonist's driving motivation to clear family name

concepts.name: Imperial Examinations
concepts.context: Path to power and redemption for the protagonist

hierarchy.structure: Linear narrative progressing from societal context to personal journey, culminating in resolution and reflection
